      • dispatchKeyEvent

        public boolean dispatchKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: JBPopup
        This callback is called when new key event from the event queue is being processed.

        The popup has a right to decide if its further processing should be continued (method return value).

        Specified by:
        dispatchKeyEvent in interface JBPopup
        Parameters:
        e - new key event being processed
        Returns:
        true if the event is completely dispatched, i.e. no further processing is necessary; false otherwise
